## WorkspaceSvg.getTopComments() method

Returns a list of comments on this workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTopComments(ordered?: boolean): RenderedWorkspaceComment[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ordered | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, sorts the comments based on their position. |

**Returns:**

[RenderedWorkspaceComment](./blockly.comments_namespace.renderedworkspacecomment_class.md)<!-- -->\[\]

A list of workspace comments.
